Name: Central Ponyville
Centre ville de Ponyville
Tents
Tentes
RawDialog: You know, {Pause:620}I always see those tents when I come by here, {Pause:1342}but I've never actually learned what they are. {Pause:1309}{Emotion:DeepThought}Maybe they're merchants? {Pause:1105}Seems like they'd be closer to town square, though. {Pause:714}{Emotion:Neutral}Or gypsies? {Pause:1154}I'd have thought they would've left by now if so.

Tu sais, {Pause:620}Je vois toujours ces tentes quand je passe par ici, {Pause:1342}mais je n'ai jamais su ce qu'elles étaient. {Pause:1309}{Emotion:DeepThought}Peut être qu'il s'agit de marchants ? {Pause:1105}Quoi qu'ils semblent loin du centre. {Pause:714}{Emotion:Neutral}Ou des gitans ? {Pause:1154}J'imagine qu'ils auraient quitté la ville depuis un moment si c'était le cas.

{Emotion:DeepThought}Or, maybe {Pause:680}{PlaySound:Realization}it's all a big front for a secret group of dragon egg smugglers, {Pause:1225}{Emotion:Neutral}and they're all hoping that, just like I have all this time, {Pause:817}we pay them no mind, because they're just tents of no consequence in the background...

{Emotion:DeepThought}Ou peut être {Pause:680}{PlaySound:Realization}qu'il s'agit d'une couverture pour un groupe secret de voleurs d'œufs de drangons, {Pause:1225}{Emotion:Neutral}et ils espèrent tous que, comme moi pendant tout ce temps, {Pause:817}on ne leur prette aucune attention, parce que ce ne sont que quelques tentes sans importance dans le décors ...
{Emotion:Surprised}...when all this time, right under our noses, they've been shifting dozens upon dozens of illicit dragon eggs to a shadowy, nefarious crime boss.
{Emotion:Surprised}... alors que tout ce temps, juste sous notre nez, ils ont convoyés des dizaines et des dizaines d'œufs de dragons illégaux vers un sombre et maléfique parrain du crime.
{Emotion:Neutral}...Nah, {Pause:546}probably gypsies.
{Emotion:Neutral}...Nah, {Pause:546}probablement des gitans.
Twi, {Pause:645}I'm pretty sure those are just set up for the town merchants.
Twi, {Pause:645}je suis assez certaine qu'ils sont juste là pour les marchants de la ville.
{Emotion:Happy}Oh, Apple Bloom, {Pause:249}where's your sense of wonder and intrigue?
{Emotion:Happy}Oh, Apple Bloom, {Pause:249}où est ton sens de l'émerveillement et de la curiosité ?
Right next to my common sense.
Juste à côté de mon bon sens.
{Emotion:Annoyed}{PlaySound:Horse_Snort}Touche.
{Emotion:Annoyed}{PlaySound:Horse_Snort}Touché.
Name: Piece of cloth
Morceau de tissu
RawDialog: A piece of cloth - {Pause:953}red on one side, {Pause:709}gold on the other... {Pause:650}{Emotion:Annoyed}I think I know what THIS is from.
Un morceau de tissu - {Pause:953}rouge d'un côté, {Pause:709}doré de l'autre ... {Pause:650}{Emotion:Annoyed}Je pense savoir d'où ÇA vient.
RawNotificationText: "Morceau de cape des CMC" ajouté aux indices.
RawDialog: Hi!
Salut !
{PlaySound:Smack2}{Emotion:Surprised}Ah! {Pause:641}{PlaySound:Snap}{Emotion:Neutral}Pinkie, {Pause:137}stop doing that! {Pause:1278}I'm trying to concentrate here!
{PlaySound:Smack2}{Emotion:Surprised}Ah! {Pause:641}{PlaySound:Snap}{Emotion:Neutral}Pinkie, {Pause:137}arrête de faire ça ! {Pause:1278}J'essaie de me concentrer là !

{PlaySound:Lightbulb}Oh! {Pause:768}Sorry. {Pause:589}But I {Pause:142}thought {Pause:26}you might {Pause:320}{PlaySound:Slide-Whistle}{Emotion:Happy2}reeeeeally {Emotion:Neutral}like to know this latest thing {Pause:684}I found in the walk{Pause:193}through!

{PlaySound:Lightbulb}Oh! {Pause:768}Désolé. {Pause:589}Mais je {Pause:142}pensais {Pause:26}que tu aimerais{Pause:320}{PlaySound:Slide-Whistle}{Emotion:Happy2}vraiiiiiment {Emotion:Neutral}savoir cette dernière astuce {Pause:684}que j'ai trouvé dans le guide {Pause:193}du jeu !
{Emotion:Annoyed}*sigh*{Pause:1219} What {Pause:355}is it?
{Emotion:Annoyed}*soupir*{Pause:1219} Qu'est ce que {Pause:355}c'est ?

{OtherEmotion:Neutral}{Emotion:Happy3}Well,{Pause:882} if you get a piece of {Pause:354}evidence that someone might know about,{Pause:687} {Emotion:Happy2}then {Pause:75}after you start talking to them, {Pause:558}you can click on "Present {Pause:312}Evidence", {Pause:467}and they'll let you know what they know about it.{Pause:300} {Emotion:Happy3}Pretty neat,{Pause:411} huh?

{OtherEmotion:Neutral}{Emotion:Happy3}Et bien,{Pause:882} si tu obtiens un morceau{Pause:354}de preuve dont quelqu'un peut savoir ce que c'est,{Pause:687} {Emotion:Happy2}dans ce cas {Pause:75}après avoir commencé à leur parler, {Pause:558}tu peux cliquer sur "Présenter {Pause:312}une preuve", {Pause:467}et ils te diront ce qu'ils savent dessus.{Pause:300} {Emotion:Happy3}Génial,{Pause:411} non ?
Uh...{Pause:642} {Emotion:Peeved}I'm supposed to do what to what now?
Uh...{Pause:642} {Emotion:Peeved}Je suis censée faire quoi là ?

{Emotion:Confused}{PlaySound:Horse_Snort}Ugh, {Pause:765}Twilight, {Pause:680}honestly, {Pause:750}what am I gonna {Pause:182}do with you? {Pause:771}*sigh* {Pause:729}{Emotion:WallBreakStare}Well, {Pause:702}YOU know what I meant, {Pause:831}right? {Pause:989}{Emotion:Happy2}So it'll {Pause:53}all work out peachy keen in the end, {Pause:469}I just {Pause:409}know it!

{Emotion:Confused}{PlaySound:Horse_Snort}Erf, {Pause:765}Twilight, {Pause:680}honnetement, {Pause:750}qu'est ce que je vais faire {Pause:182}de toi ? {Pause:771}*sigh* {Pause:729}{Emotion:WallBreakStare}Bon, {Pause:702}TOI, tu sais ce que je veux dire, {Pause:831}pas vrai? {Pause:989}{Emotion:Happy2}Donc cela {Pause:53}devrait fonctionner, au final, sans probleme, {Pause:469}Je le {Pause:409}sait !
Way to fill me with confidence,{Pause:665} Pinkie.
C'est parfait pour booster ma confiance en moi,{Pause:665} Pinkie.
Well,{Pause:492} that's all I got!{Pause:656} {Emotion:Happy3}See you 'round, Twilight!{Pause:599} {Emotion:WallBreakWave}'Till next time!
Et bien,{Pause:492} c'est tout ce que je peux faire !{Pause:656} {Emotion:Happy3}A un de ces quatres, Twilight!{Pause:599} {Emotion:WallBreakWave}À la prochaine fois !
Name: Flower bush
Buisson
RawDialog: Just a flower bush. {Pause:1190}Nothing special, {Pause:1039}really.
C'est juste un buisson. {Pause:1190}Rien de particulier, {Pause:1039}vraiment.
Although, {Pause:690}now that I take a closer look... {Pause:1391}there's a ball here. {Pause:1357}With a... note? {Pause:782}Hmmm.
Quoique, {Pause:690}maintenant que je le regarde plus près... {Pause:1391}il y a un ballon. {Pause:1357}Avec... une note? {Pause:782}Hmmm.
"Sometimes a pony just has a plain ol' ball emergency, {Pause:1895}and that's why I've set {Pause:588}THESE up! {Pause:1170}Play around with it as much as you like!"
"Parfois un poney à besoin d'urgence d'une bonne vieille balle, {Pause:1895}et c'est pourquoi j'ai placé {Pause:588}CELLES-LA ici! {Pause:1170}Joue avec autant que tu veux avec !"
"Just make suuuuure you return it here when you're done with it! {Pause:2245}Wouldn't want somepony to have a ball emergency and not be able to solve it. {Pause:1149}Okey dokey lokey?"

"Assure toi juuuussstttee de la remettre en place quand tu as fini avec ! {Pause:2245}Tu ne voudrais pas qu'un poney ai besoin d'une balle en urgence et ne puisse pas en trouver ?{Pause:1149}Okey dokey lokey?"
...Somehow {Pause:867}{PlaySound:Realization}I get a sense for who put this here.
...D'une certaine manière {Pause:867}{PlaySound:Realization}J'ai une idée de qui a mis ça là.
{OtherEmotion:NeutralDown}Saaaay, {Pause:726}I could use a ball! {Pause:830}{Emotion:Annoyed}Y'know, {Pause:366}ever since you broke ours, Twi.
{OtherEmotion:NeutralDown}Diiiit, {Pause:726}Je pourrais utiliser un ballon ! {Pause:830}{Emotion:Annoyed}Tu sais, {Pause:366}depuis le jour où tu as cassé le notre, Twi.
{Emotion:Peeved}{PlaySound:Horse_Snort}Please don't remind me of that day, {Pause:188}Apple Bloom...
{Emotion:Peeved}{PlaySound:Horse_Snort}S'il te plais ne me rappel pas ce joura, {Pause:188}Apple Bloom...
I'm not {Pause:566}done investigating the crime scene yet. {Pause:1210}I should look around more.
Je n'ai pas {Pause:566}encore fini d'examiner la scène de crime. {Pause:1210}Je devrais continuer de chercher.
Name: Town Hall
Mairie
RawDialog: Ahhh, {Pause:542}Town Hall, {Pause:887}where everypony that's anypony has business, {Pause:1225}where the greatest among us tackle tough challenges and lead the path to the future, {Pause:1725}where our political heroes put aside their differences and make tough compromises for a better tomorrow.

Ahhh, {Pause:542}la Mairie, {Pause:887}le lieu où les gens important ont affaire, {Pause:1225}où les meilleurs d'entre nous s'attaque aux plus grandes des difficultés et nous dirigent sur le chemin du futur, {Pause:1725}où nos héros politiques mettent de côté leurs différences et acceptent de faire des compromis difficiles pour assurer un lendemain meilleur.
{Emotion:Neutral}...Or, {Pause:279}perhaps, the place where the Mayor plays Solitaire while pretending to be interested in what you're saying. {Pause:1786}Either works.
{Emotion:Neutral}...Ou, {Pause:279}plutôt, l'endroit ou la Maire joue au solitaire tout en prétendant être intéressé dans ce que vousdites. {Pause:1786}Les deux marchent.
Name: Statue
Statue
RawDialog: {PlaySound:Lightbulb}This is one beautifully {Pause:608}carved statue! {Pause:1435}{Emotion:Neutral}I wonder what it's for... {Pause:1212}oh, {Pause:528}hey, {Pause:605}there's a dedication here.

{PlaySound:Lightbulb}Cette statue {Pause:608}est admirablement bien scultée ! {Pause:1435}{Emotion:Neutral}Je me demande pourquoi c'est... {Pause:1212}oh, {Pause:528}hey, {Pause:605}il y à une explication ici.
"Erected in honor of the {Pause:725}{Emotion:Annoyed}bravest, most {Pause:868}upright public servant Ponyville has ever known!"
"Erigé en l'honneur de la {Pause:725}{Emotion:Annoyed}plus brave, la plus intègre {Pause:868}des fonctionnaires que Ponyville ait connue !"
{Emotion:Neutral}I'm {Pause:478}getting the sense that this is talking about the Mayor. {Pause:1572}{PlaySound:Horse_Snort}...And was {Pause:637}written by the Mayor.
{Emotion:Neutral}J'ai {Pause:478}l'impression que cela parle du Maire. {Pause:1572}{PlaySound:Horse_Snort}...Et que cela {Pause:637}a été écrit par la Maire.
Name: Eclair
Eclair
Abby Sprocket
Abby Sprocket
Hoover Sweeps
Hoover Sweeps
Apple Bloom
Apple Bloom
Rainbow Dash
Rainbow Dash
Apple Bloom
Apple Bloom
Crowd
Foule
RawDialog: What's this {Pause:724}crowd all about? {Pause:1099}I didn't know there was an event today.
Pourquoi il y a{Pause:724}autant de monde ici ? {Pause:1099}Je ne savais pas qu'il y avait un événement aujourd'hui.
They're having an apple-eating contest!
Ils font un concours de qui mange le plus de pomme !
Yeah, {Pause:1802}and Applejack's way in the lead!
Yeah, {Pause:1802}et Applejack est de loin en tête !
APPLEJACK! {Pause:637}APPLEJACK! {Pause:1637}APPLEJACK!
APPLEJACK! {Pause:637}APPLEJACK! {Pause:1637}APPLEJACK!
...Whoa, {Pause:503}if she eats all those apples, {Pause:1380}{Emotion:Sad}she might get a wicked bad tummy ache.
...Wow, {Pause:503}si elle mange toutes ces pommes, {Pause:1380}{Emotion:Sad}elle risque d'avoir des maux de ventres plutot violent.
{OtherEmotion:NeutralDown}Applejack! {Pause:887}Applejack!
{OtherEmotion:NeutralDown}Applejack! {Pause:887}Applejack!
Is... {Pause:722}it healthy for her to be eating that many apples?
Est ce c'est... {Pause:722}sain pour elle de manger autant de pommes ?

{PlaySound:Lightbulb}'Course it is, Twi! {Pause:920}{Emotion:NeutralUp}Why, {Pause:425}it's an Apple family tradition to be the best at apple eatin'! {Pause:1001}{Emotion:HappyUp}We've been doin' this for generations!

{PlaySound:Lightbulb}'Sur que ça l'est, Twi ! {Pause:920}{Emotion:NeutralUp}Simplement, {Pause:425}c'est une tradition familiale des APpe d'etre les meilleurs dans ce concours là ! {Pause:1001}{Emotion:HappyUp}Nous le faisons depuis des générations !
That's an... {Pause:661}{Emotion:Peeved}oddly specific tradition.
C'est vraiment... {Pause:661}{Emotion:Peeved}une tradition étrangement précise.
{Emotion:NeutralUp}C'mon, Twi, {Pause:864}where's your sense of competition? {Pause:625}Ain'tcha enthused at ALL by this?
{Emotion:NeutralUp}Allez, Twi, {Pause:864}ou est passé ton sens de la compétition ? {Pause:625} tout ceci ne te rend pas enthousiaste ?

{Emotion:NeutralDown}Well, {Pause:262}sure, {Pause:662}{Emotion:HappyDown}I like a healthy competition, just, {Pause:972}{Emotion:NeutralDown}you know... {Pause:284}{Emotion:HappyDown}more mental. {Pause:551}Like, say, chess, {Pause:556}or trivia!

{Emotion:NeutralDown}Et bien, {Pause:262}très certainement, {Pause:662}{Emotion:HappyDown}J'apprécie une bonne compétition, c'est juste que, {Pause:972}{Emotion:NeutralDown}tu sais... {Pause:284}{Emotion:HappyDown}plus intellectuel. {Pause:551}Comme par exemple, les échecs, {Pause:556}ou les quizz !
{Emotion:Annoyed}...Y'really are as boring as they say, {Pause:803}Twi.
{Emotion:Annoyed}...T'es vraiment aussi rasante qu'ils le disent, {Pause:803}Twi.
{Emotion:Annoyed}{Aside}(Thanks, {Pause:603}Apple Bloom.){/Aside}
{Emotion:Annoyed}{Aside}(Merci, {Pause:603}Apple Bloom.){/Aside}
I don't have any business at town hall. {Pause:1270}The mayor's probably busy; {Pause:909}I wouldn't want to bother her without cause.
Je n'ai rien à faire à la Mairie. {Pause:1270}La maire est probablement occupée; {Pause:909}Je ne voudrais pas la déranger sans raisons.
This road leads to Sweet Apple Acres. {Pause:1396}I don't have any business there. {Pause:551}Focus, Twilight.
Ce chemin mène vers la Ferme de la Douce Pomme. {Pause:1396}Je n'ai rien à y faire. {Pause:551}Concentre toi, Twilight.
...Where am I going? {Pause:1127}That leads away from Ponyville. {Pause:1654}No reason to go in that direction.
...Mais où je vais ? {Pause:1127}Cela nous éloigne de Poneyville. {Pause:1654}Aucuneraisons d'aller par là.
Name: Bed
Lit
RawDialog: Huh... {Pause:909}this furniture looks like it's been carved right out of gems. {Pause:1974}I {Pause:414}guess that makes sense - {Pause:755}if that's what's available, {Pause:336}that's what you use.

Euh... {Pause:909}ce mobilier à l'air d'avoir été sculté directement à partir de pierres précieuses. {Pause:1974}J' {Pause:414}imagine que ça à du sens - {Pause:755}si c'est ce qui est disponible, {Pause:336}c'est ce que tu utilises.
NOT {Pause:418}that I want to give the Diamond Dogs any credit for anything, {Pause:1704}but... {Pause:799}{Emotion:Happy}this is quite fascinating! {Pause:919}I've never seen anything like it.

Non pas {Pause:418}pas que je veuille donner aux Chiens à Diamant le moindre crédit, {Pause:1704}mais... {Pause:799}{Emotion:Happy}C'est est vraiment fascinant ! {Pause:919}Je n'ai jamais rien vu de pareil.
RawNotificationText: "Meubles scultés dans des pierres précieuses" ajouté aux preuves.
RawDialog: That's... {Pause:750}it? {Pause:928}{Emotion:DeepThought}I {Pause:484}feel like I've found all that I'm going to in these caverns, {Pause:1054}{Emotion:Sad}but this still isn't enough...
C'est... {Pause:750}tout ? {Pause:928}{Emotion:DeepThought}Je {Pause:484}sens que j'ai trouvé tout ce qu'il y avait dans ces cavernes, {Pause:1054}{Emotion:Sad}mais ce n'est toujours pas assez...
Well... {Pause:696}there {Pause:382}{PlaySound:Lightbulb}IS {Pause:571}one other possible place to search, {Pause:612}darling.
Bon... {Pause:696}Il y {Pause:382}{PlaySound:Lightbulb}A {Pause:571} un autre endroit où chercher, {Pause:612}ma chérie.
{Emotion:Neutral}Really? {Pause:603}Where? {Pause:559}Where!?
{Emotion:Neutral}Vraiment ? {Pause:603}Où ? {Pause:559}Où !?

You could always have a look around the place where I initially found True Blue. {Pause:1067}{Emotion:Sad}I haven't the slightest idea if you'll find much, but... {Pause:1189}{Emotion:Happy}it might be worth a look, {Pause:612}no?

Tu pourrais toujours aller faire un tour à l'endroit ou j'ai trouvé True Blue initialement. {Pause:1067}{Emotion:Sad}Je n'ai pas la moindre idée de ce que tu y trouveras, mais, but... {Pause:1189}{Emotion:Happy}cela peut valoir le coup d'y jeter un oeil, {Pause:612}non ?
{Emotion:Neutral}It's just down the road from the fork we took to get to these caverns.
{Emotion:Neutral}C'est juste en bas de la route en partant de la fourche que nous avons pris pour venir dans ces cavernes.
Well, {Pause:602}{Emotion:Happy}all right... {Pause:271}let's go, then!
Bon, {Pause:602}{Emotion:Happy}dans ce cas... {Pause:271}allons y alors!
RawNotificationText: You can now go to the dig site!
Tu peux maintenant aller vers le site des fouilles !
Name: Chair
Chaise
RawDialog: Huh... {Pause:909}this furniture looks like it's been carved right out of gems. {Pause:1974}I {Pause:414}guess that makes sense - {Pause:755}if that's what's available, {Pause:336}that's what you use.

Euh... {Pause:909}ce mobilier à l'air d'avoir été sculté directement à partir de pierres précieuses. {Pause:1974}J' {Pause:414}imagine que ça à du sens - {Pause:755}si c'est ce qui est disponible, {Pause:336}c'est ce que tu utilises.
NOT {Pause:418}that I want to give the Diamond Dogs any credit for anything, {Pause:1704}but... {Pause:799}{Emotion:Happy}this is quite fascinating! {Pause:919}I've never seen anything like it.

Non pas {Pause:418}pas que je veuille donner aux Chiens à Diamant le moindre crédit, {Pause:1704}mais... {Pause:799}{Emotion:Happy}C'est est vraiment fascinant ! {Pause:919}Je n'ai jamais rien vu de pareil.
RawNotificationText: "Meubles scultés dans des pierres précieuses" ajouté aux preuves.
RawDialog: That's... {Pause:750}it? {Pause:928}{Emotion:DeepThought}I {Pause:484}feel like I've found all that I'm going to in these caverns, {Pause:1054}{Emotion:Sad}but this still isn't enough...
C'est... {Pause:750}tout ? {Pause:928}{Emotion:DeepThought}Je {Pause:484}sens que j'ai trouvé tout ce qu'il y avait dans ces cavernes, {Pause:1054}{Emotion:Sad}mais ce n'est toujours pas assez...
Well... {Pause:696}there {Pause:382}{PlaySound:Lightbulb}IS {Pause:571}one other possible place to search, {Pause:612}darling.
Bon... {Pause:696}Il y {Pause:382}{PlaySound:Lightbulb}A {Pause:571} un autre endroit où chercher, {Pause:612}ma chérie.
{Emotion:Neutral}Really? {Pause:603}Where? {Pause:559}Where!?
{Emotion:Neutral}Vraiment ? {Pause:603}Où ? {Pause:559}Où !?

You could always have a look around the place where I initially found True Blue. {Pause:1067}{Emotion:Sad}I haven't the slightest idea if you'll find much, but... {Pause:1189}{Emotion:Happy}it might be worth a look, {Pause:612}no?

Tu pourrais toujours aller faire un tour à l'endroit ou j'ai trouvé True Blue initialement. {Pause:1067}{Emotion:Sad}Je n'ai pas la moindre idée de ce que tu y trouveras, mais, but... {Pause:1189}{Emotion:Happy}cela peut valoir le coup d'y jeter un oeil, {Pause:612}non ?
{Emotion:Neutral}It's just down the road from the fork we took to get to these caverns.
{Emotion:Neutral}C'est juste en bas de la route en partant de la fourche que nous avons pris pour venir dans ces cavernes.
Well, {Pause:602}{Emotion:Happy}all right... {Pause:271}let's go, then!
Bon, {Pause:602}{Emotion:Happy}dans ce cas... {Pause:271}allons y alors!
RawNotificationText: You can now go to the dig site!
Tu peux maintenant aller vers le site des fouilles !
Name: Mining tools
Outils miniers
RawDialog: Now, this is peculiar. {Pause:911}Last I was here, the dogs dug just using their claws. {Pause:1308}I wonder what these are for.
Now, this is peculiar. {Pause:911}Last I was here, the dogs dug just using their claws. {Pause:1308}I wonder what these are for.
Maybe they got {Pause:515}tired of that?
Maybe they got {Pause:515}tired of that?
{Emotion:Neutral}Ah ha ha... {Pause:784}darling, {Pause:493}their floor is dirt and their walls are dusty rock. {Pause:714}I daresay a dog would not mind a little grime in his claws.
{Emotion:Neutral}Ah ha ha... {Pause:784}darling, {Pause:493}their floor is dirt and their walls are dusty rock. {Pause:714}I daresay a dog would not mind a little grime in his claws.
Then... {Pause:606}what {Pause:465}WOULD this be for?
Then... {Pause:606}what {Pause:465}WOULD this be for?
Well, {Pause:582}I haven't a clue about THAT, my dear. {Pause:1056}Perhaps... {Pause:567}{Emotion:Happy}{PlaySound:Lightbulb}carving rocks! {Pause:425}For sculpture!
Well, {Pause:582}I haven't a clue about THAT, my dear. {Pause:1056}Perhaps... {Pause:567}{Emotion:Happy}{PlaySound:Lightbulb}carving rocks! {Pause:425}For sculpture!

{Aside}(...Rarity, {Pause:434}only you could arrive at the conclusion that a shovel and crowbar are more likely to be used for fine art than for practical matters... {Pause:2092}{PlaySound:Realization}and then {Pause:320}manage to make it sound plausible.){/Aside}

{Aside}(...Rarity, {Pause:434}only you could arrive at the conclusion that a shovel and crowbar are more likely to be used for fine art than for practical matters... {Pause:2092}{PlaySound:Realization}and then {Pause:320}manage to make it sound plausible.){/Aside}
Name: Vest
Vest
RawDialog: {PlaySound:Smack2}Ugh, {Pause:655}ick! {Pause:615}How DO these dogs stay sane when they all wear the same style of clothing? {Pause:1505}I mean, {Pause:316}in CANTERLOT, {Pause:804}if even TWO ponies are caught wearing the same dress, {Pause:1132}{Emotion:Melodramatic}that would be a MAJOR faux pas, {Pause:924}let alone EVERYPONY!

Name: Apple Bloom's Testimony
Apple Bloom's Testimony
Description: "Anyway, we were practicin' in the town square last night like always, and things were goin' pretty well. We took a break, durin' which time me and Sweetie Belle hung out by the bridge. But... I dunno where Scootaloo was at that time or what she was up to."

Ribbon

PassiveAbilityDescription: Rarity has long had a way with sweet-talking ponies into getting her way, and she's always happy to lend her talents to help out a friend. Call on Rarity if a male pony or a pony with an ego is giving you the cold shoulder.

Rarity has long had a way with sweet-talking ponies into getting her way, and she's always happy to lend her talents to help out a friend. Call on Rarity if a male pony or a pony with an ego is giving you the cold shoulder.
ActiveAbilityDescription: Rarity has refined her gem-finding skill to the point that it can find anything small that might have otherwise been overlooked. If you feel like you're looking for a needle in a haystack, using Rarity's skill in the field might help.
